profile: Web & Mobile developer with 4 years of experience in front-end and back-end development. Specialized in React, Node.js, Drupal and Symfony, I have contributed to the development of digital solutions for companies like Thales.
skills: Code optimization with good practices and good packages

missions: Stack : CodeIgniter (PHP), React Native (Redux), OneSignal, OVH/CDN
Design of data models (tiles, users, services) and application architecture.

Setting up messaging (emails, SMS, push notifications via OneSignal).
Deployment on OVH with performance optimization via CDN.

Development of risk mapping forms and generation of PDF reports (radar, analyses).
Multi-role user management (companies & administrators).

Integration of DataTables for sorting, searching and exporting data.
Adding visualizations (diagrams, geographic maps via Leaflet.js).

Creation and integration of the custom Drupal 10 theme with MVC architecture.
Integration of modules: Webform (advanced forms), SEO, Feeds, JSON:API Views, LazyLoad, AddToAny.
Development of custom modules adapted to specific needs.

Maintenance and corrections for an international cybersecurity showcase site.
Stack : React.js, TypeScript, Node.js
Frontend design with React & TypeScript (reusable components, advanced forms).
